name: MirrorMe
summary: MirrorMe makes it easy to manage mobile testing with in-app screen capture and video recording of bugs.
description:
MirrorMe provides a unified framework for QA, UAT and beta testing of mobile apps.  With the MirrorMe SDK embedded in an app, users can capture screenshots and record video of captured bugs.

UAT and beta testers can use the same framework to submit annotated screenshots and video recordings of issues as well.  Issues and videos can be replayed on the MirrorMe dashboard, complete with touch data representing all of the users' interactions in an app.
